title: Monolithic vs Microservices: The Architecture Decision That'll Make or Break
excerpt: So you're sitting there, staring at your screen, trying to figure out whether to build your next app as one big monolith or split it into a bunch of microservices. Trust me, I've been there. This decision feels huge because, well, it kind of is. Get it wrong and you'll be dealing with the consequences for years.
